abilities.name: Ability Type
abilities.description: Demon Gaze Ability TypeBuff Arlott possesses a demonic eye that will Mark enemy units near Arlott that become affected by control effects for 8s.The eye will also automatically Mark a nearby enemy hero in vision every 8s.

abilities.name: Ability Type
abilities.description: Dauntless Strike Ability TypeCC AOE DamagePhysical Base Cooldown: 8.0 Base Mana Cost: 50 Arlott swings his lance forward, dealing 200 (+60%Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage and briefly stunning targets in an area. Targets hit by the further part of the AOE will be stunned for 1s instead.

abilities.name: Ability Type
abilities.description: Vengeance Ability TypeDamage Mobility DamagePhysical Base Cooldown: 10.0 Base Mana Cost: 40 Arlott charges at an enemy, dealing 135 (+60%Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage (this skill cannot be interrupted during movement).If Arlott's target is Marked, this skill will deal double damage, immediately refresh its cooldown, and restore (90%Total Physical Attack) HP to Arlott (only restores 50% of that amount when used on a non-hero unit).

abilities.name: Ability Type
abilities.description: Final Slash Ability TypeCC AOE DamagePhysical Base Cooldown: 24.0 Base Mana Cost: 100 Arlott cleaves in front of him, dealing 400 (+80%Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to targets in the area while pushing them to the end of the AOE and briefly revealing their location.
